SENTIENT SPECIES:
Scaly Robots with Five-fold Symmetry: Purely mechanical lifeforms, artificially created. They have five-fold symmetry. They are meditative and believe in the inherent superiority of their species. They were created by the Tenth Church of Trolloids, Koboldoids and Robots on Eykos I as servants in 3515.
	Their Stats are: STR: 1 DEX: 0 CON: 1 INT: 2 CHA: 2
Yellow Koboldoids: Eat pretty much anything, including one another. Disturbingly fond of skulls. They have yellow skin. They have bilateral symmetry. They are thrill-seeking and value personal integrity above all else. They were uplifted by the Second Church of Trolloids, Koboldoids, Robots and Deep Dwellers on Feluq IV in 2840.
	Their Stats are: STR: -1 DEX: 1 CON: 1 INT: -1 CHA: -2

CIVILISATIONS:
THE CHURCH OF KOBOLDOIDS AND ROBOTS:
An ancient, corrupt, fantastically wealthy, highly advanced Church of 22 planets, with 25 billion inhabitants.
Major populations:
16 billion Scaly Robots with Five-fold Symmetry.
9 billion Yellow Koboldoids.
It controls a Living Weapon.
It controls a Universal Nutrient.

	Their Stats are: STR: 2 DEX: 0 CON: 2 INT: 0 CHA: -1
PLANETS:
BOMEV II
A barren planet.
In orbit: A giant spaceborne yellow jellyfish threatening the planet.
Vast Canyons: Gashes in the planet's crust so deep they reach the hot mantle, emitting gases noxious to much life but highly nutritious to some.
Strata:
A block of time ice, encasing Subcomponent 23/4432, President of the Fourth Republic of Scaly Robots with Five-fold Symmetry created by the rogue AI Experiment 8 in 3967, buried in 1990.
The ruins of a military base, built by the Church of Koboldoids and Robots in 3899, destroyed in 1990 by a time vortex.
A Virtual Reality Matrix created by the rogue AI Mind 293 in 3856, buried in 3882.
The ruins of a mining base, built by the Church of Koboldoids and Robots in 3845, destroyed in 3882 due to orbital bombardment by the Church of Two-Headed Purple Robots.
The ruins of a mining base, built by the Third Republic of Scaly Robots with Five-fold Symmetry in 3806, destroyed in 3835 during the collapse of the Third Republic of Scaly Robots with Five-fold Symmetry.
Remnants of a culture of Scaly Robots with Five-fold Symmetry that collapsed when the planet was scoured by a superweapon of the Tenth Church of Trolloids, Koboldoids and Robots in 3711.
The ruins of a vast museum, built by the Tenth Church of Trolloids, Koboldoids and Robots in 3526, destroyed in 3642 .
The ruins of a grand palace, built by the Tenth Church of Trolloids, Koboldoids and Robots in 3522, destroyed in 3642 .
The ruins of a repair bay, built by the Second Empire of Two-Headed Purple Robots in 3471, destroyed in 3642 .
Remnants of a culture of Yellow Koboldoids that collapsed from the effects of pollution in 3642.
The ruins of a city of spires, built by the Second Empire of Two-Headed Purple Robots in 3475, destroyed in 3520 through orbital bombardment by the Church of Two-Headed Purple Robots.
Remnants of a culture of Slim Blue Robots that collapsed from the effects of pollution in 3061.
The Tomb of Captain Unit 12-Theta-23, buried in 2973.

ZIGGURAT II
A barren planet of the Church of Koboldoids and Robots.
It is a little polluted.
A mining base, built by the Church of Koboldoids and Robots in 3980
Beaufiful Aurorae: The solar wind makes bright displays of flickering green at the planet's poles.
Tidally Locked: This planet always presents the same side to its sun. There is perpetual day on one side, perpetual night on the other, and a ring of eternal twilight in between.
Strata:
The ruins of a military base, built by the Church of Koboldoids and Robots in 3928, destroyed in 3979 due to orbital bombardment by the Fourth Republic of Scaly Robots with Five-fold Symmetry.
The ruins of a science lab, built by the Church of Koboldoids and Robots in 3902, destroyed in 3918 after the transcendence of the Second Empire of Koboldoids and Robots.
The ruins of a military base, built by the Second Empire of Two-Headed Purple Robots in 3887, destroyed in 3889 due to orbital bombardment by the Fourth Church of Scaly Robots with Five-fold Symmetry.
The ruins of a mining base, built by the Second Empire of Two-Headed Purple Robots in 3858, destroyed in 3885 during the invasion of the Fourth Church of Scaly Robots with Five-fold Symmetry.
A Universal Computer Virus created by the rogue AI Mind 259 in 3837, hidden in 3847.
The ruins of a military base, built by the Tenth Church of Trolloids, Koboldoids and Robots in 3493, destroyed in 3835 during the collapse of the Third Republic of Scaly Robots with Five-fold Symmetry.
The ruins of a vast museum, built by the Second Empire of Two-Headed Purple Robots in 3466, destroyed in 3491 when the planet was scoured by a superweapon of the Fifth Church of Trolloids, Koboldoids and Robots.
The ruins of a vast museum, built by the Tenth Church of Trolloids, Koboldoids and Robots in 3362, destroyed in 3443 during the invasion of the Second Republic of Koboldoids and Robots.
The ruins of a complex of arcologies, built by the Tenth Church of Trolloids, Koboldoids and Robots in 3347, destroyed in 3430 through orbital bombardment by the Kingdom of Yellow Koboldoids.
A film about the Emperor of the Second Empire of Tiny Koboldoids created by the Second Church of Tiny Koboldoids in 3322, buried in 3343.
Remnants of a culture of Yellow Koboldoids that collapsed from the effects of pollution in 3172.
Remnants of a culture of Scaly Trolloids that collapsed from the effects of pollution in 3090.

SATIVEX III
A barren planet of the Church of Koboldoids and Robots.
It is slightly polluted.
A military base, built by the Church of Koboldoids and Robots in 3984
Deep Impenetrable Seas: Hundreds of kilometres down, water turns into ice from pressure.
Vast Empty Plains: Brown, dusty and featureless, their monotony is broken only by the occasional rivulet around which cluster many flying animals.
Strata:
The ruins of a mining base, built by the Church of Koboldoids and Robots in 3928, destroyed in 1990 by a time vortex.
Fossils of pharmaceuticals that went extinct in 3771 due to a psionic shockwave.
The ruins of a complex of arcologies, built by the Third Republic of Scaly Robots with Five-fold Symmetry in 3768, destroyed in 3771 by a psionic shockwave.
The ruins of a orbital elevator, built by the Third Republic of Scaly Robots with Five-fold Symmetry in 3749, destroyed in 3771 by a psionic shockwave.
The ruins of a city of spires, built by the Third Republic of Scaly Robots with Five-fold Symmetry in 3747, destroyed in 3771 by a psionic shockwave.
Remnants of a culture of Feathered Humanoids with Threefold Symmetry that collapsed due to a psionic shockwave in 3771.
Remnants of a culture of Feathered Orange Antoids that collapsed from mass hysteria in 3740.
Remnants of a culture of Amorphous Deep Dwellers that collapsed from the effects of pollution in 3709.
The ruins of a grand palace, built by the Second Church of Tiny Koboldoids in 3047, destroyed in 3191 .
The ruins of a orbital elevator, built by the Second Church of Tiny Koboldoids in 3028, destroyed in 3191 .
Remnants of a culture of Yellow Koboldoids that collapsed from the effects of pollution in 3181.

The ruins of a vast museum, built by the Empire of Yellow Koboldoids in 3000, destroyed in 3003 during the invasion of the Republic of Trolloids, Koboldoids and Robots.

VIM I
A barren planet of the Church of Koboldoids and Robots.
It is very heavily polluted.
A mining base, built by the Church of Koboldoids and Robots in 3924
Gem World: Huge, beautiful gems many metres across can be found in caves and in veins.
Periodical Darkness: Every thirteen years, the orbit of this planet synchronizes with that of a planet closer to its stars, causing a night that lasts for weeks.
Strata:
The ruins of a science lab, built by the Church of Koboldoids and Robots in 3907, destroyed in 3918 after the transcendence of the Second Empire of Koboldoids and Robots.
The ruins of a mining base, built by the Church of Koboldoids and Robots in 3856, destroyed in 3884 due to orbital bombardment by the Church of Two-Headed Purple Robots.

A barren planet of the Church of Koboldoids and Robots.
It is a little polluted.

Titanic Mountains: Mountain ranges so vast they poke out of the atmosphere into space.
Strata:
The ruins of a mining base, built by the Third Republic of Scaly Robots with Five-fold Symmetry in 3747, destroyed in 3917 due to orbital bombardment by the Sixth Church of Scaly Robots with Five-fold Symmetry.
Remnants of a culture of Scaly Trolloids that collapsed from mass hysteria in 2994.
Remnants of a culture of Yellow Koboldoids that collapsed due to orbital bombardment by the Second Empire of Trolloids, Koboldoids and Robots in 2986.
A Time Machine created by the Church of Koboldoids and Robots in 3974, lost in 1493.

FREIA VI
A barren planet.
It is a little polluted.
Gem World: Huge, beautiful gems many metres across can be found in caves and in veins.
Strata:
A Hoard of the Pirate Black Claw, buried in 3983.
The ruins of a mining base, built by the Fourth Republic of Scaly Robots with Five-fold Symmetry in 3965, destroyed in 1990 by a time vortex.
The ruins of a military base, built by the Church of Koboldoids and Robots in 3840, destroyed in 3918 after the transcendence of the Second Empire of Koboldoids and Robots.
A Teleport Gate created by the rogue AI Mind 83 in 3491, buried in 3705.
Remnants of a culture of Yellow Koboldoids that collapsed when the planet was scoured by a superweapon of the Fifth Church of Trolloids, Koboldoids and Robots in 3487.
The ruins of a complex of arcologies, built by the Second Church of Tiny Koboldoids in 3328, destroyed in 3449 .
Remnants of a culture of Yellow Koboldoids that collapsed from mass hysteria in 3075.
Remnants of a culture of Tiny Koboldoids that collapsed from the effects of pollution in 2984.

HYLUS II
A life-bearing planet.
It is a little polluted.
Vast Empty Plains: Brown, dusty and featureless, their monotony is broken only by the occasional rivulet around which cluster many flying animals.

FEMUV V
A barren planet of the Church of Koboldoids and Robots.
It is very heavily polluted.
A military base, built by the Church of Koboldoids and Robots in 3896
Gigantic Cave Network: Thousands of kilometres of partially submerged caves riddle the crust of this planet. Very easy to get lost or hide in.
Musical Caves: The wind whistles through massive caves and across rocks, producing an eerie music.
Vast Canyons: Gashes in the planet's crust so deep they reach the hot mantle, emitting gases noxious to much life but highly nutritious to some.
Periodical Darkness: Every thirteen years, the orbit of this planet synchronizes with that of a planet closer to its stars, causing a night that lasts for weeks.
Strata:
The ruins of a vast underground vault, built by the Second Empire of Two-Headed Purple Robots in 3882, destroyed in 3890 .
The ruins of a vast museum, built by the Second Empire of Two-Headed Purple Robots in 3881, destroyed in 3890 .

The ruins of a complex of arcologies, built by the Second Empire of Two-Headed Purple Robots in 3860, destroyed in 3881 through orbital bombardment by the Fourth Church of Scaly Robots with Five-fold Symmetry.
The ruins of a military base, built by the Third Republic of Scaly Robots with Five-fold Symmetry in 3807, destroyed in 3835 during the collapse of the Third Republic of Scaly Robots with Five-fold Symmetry.

Remnants of a culture of Yellow Koboldoids that collapsed due to a massive asteroid impact in 3647.

HISTORY:
0:
IN THE BEGINNING, ALL WAS DARK.
THEN, PLANETS BEGAN TO FORM:
Bomev II, Ziggurat II, Sativex III, Nid VI, Regor IV, Eykos I, Comes II, Vim I, Aomep II, Regor VI, Wotan II, Krantor IV, Feluq IV, Krantor V, Eymos V, Taranis IV, Hylon II, Freia VI, Hylus II, Fokes I, Euliw I, Eenuw III, Femuv V, Lumen II, Jurvox III, Gynow VI, Mera II, Hylus V
19:
Fokes I becomes covered with ice.
22:
Titanic mountains form on Feluq IV.
Life arises on Hylus II
25:
Life arises on Hylus V
26:
Deep impenetrable seas form on Sativex III.
Life arises on Sativex III
34:
Life arises on Feluq IV
Vast grazing herds evolve on Hylus V.
35:
Ultravores evolve on Sativex III.
37:
Vast grazing herds evolve on Hylus II.
41:
A giant spaceborne blue crystal appears from the depths of space and menaces the skies of Eymos V.
Regor VI has become a poison world.
50:
Gas bags evolve on Feluq IV.
A gigantic network of caves forms on Femuv V.
51:
Life arises on Jurvox III
54:
Sentient Purple Catoids arise on Hylus II.
55:
Shape-shifters evolve on Hylus V.
56:
The giant spaceborne blue crystal leaves the orbit of Eymos V and heads back into deep space.
57:
Titanic mountains form on Krantor IV.
59:
A giant spaceborne white crystal appears from the depths of space and menaces the skies of Sativex III.
60:
Ocean giants evolve on Jurvox III.
63:
Ultravores evolve on Hylus II.
Shape-shifters evolve on Jurvox III.
67:
Sentient Two-Headed Antoids arise on Feluq IV.
70:
The population of Two-Headed Antoids on Feluq IV has grown by a billion.
The giant spaceborne white crystal leaves the orbit of Sativex III and heads back into deep space.
The Purple Catoids on Hylus II achieve spaceflight and organise as a Theocracy, the Church of Purple Catoids.

They discover: Remnants of a culture of Black Trolloids that transcended the bounds of this universe in 985.

The Empire of Flying Trolloids rewards the adventurer handsomely.

Civ Name: Second Church of Antoids and Humanoids 
Civ Birth Year: 1191 
Civ Stats Str|Dex|Con|Int|Cha
          -3 | 1 | -1 | 0 | 1 | 
Resources 809 Science 465 Military 190 WeapLevel 6 TechLevel 10 Decrepitude 983
The Empire of Six-Legged Black Antoids secedes from the Second Church of Antoids and Humanoids, leading to a civil war!
The Second Church of Antoids and Humanoids conquer Nid VI, a colony of the Empire of Six-Legged Black Antoids, using their mind control device to gain control of the planet from orbit.

The two civilizations combine into the Eighth Republic of Antoids, Koboldoids, Robots and Deep Dwellers.

          3 | 2 | 4 | 2 | 0 |

A popular movement overthrows the old guard of the Second Kingdom of Trolloids, Koboldoids and Robots and declares the Republic of Trolloids, Koboldoids and Robots.
The Republic of Trolloids, Koboldoids and Robots conquer Sativex III, a colony of the Empire of Yellow Koboldoids.
An expedition led by Captain Node 550-b explores Euliw I. They trade with the local Scaly Trolloids. They discover: Remnants of a culture of Two-Headed Green Robots with Threefold Symmetry that collapsed due to orbital bombardment by the Empire of Yellow Koboldoids in 2977. 
An expedition led by Captain Node 550-b explores Regor VI. They trade with the local Scaly Trolloids. They discover: Remnants of a culture of Scaly Robots that collapsed from the effects of pollution in 2993. 
A shift in the orbital axis of Regor VI spells doom for all life on the planet!

The Second Empire of Yellow Koboldoids explore Hylus II. They discover: Fossils of ultravores that went extinct in 3056 due to a psionic shockwave. They discover: The ruins of a gene library, built by the Second Republic of Trolloids, Koboldoids and Robots in 3020, destroyed in 3056 by a psionic shockwave. They discover: Remnants of a culture of Yellow Koboldoids that collapsed due to a psionic shockwave in 3056. They discover: Remnants of a culture of Yellow Koboldoids that collapsed from the effects of pollution in 3056. They discover: The ruins of a skull pile, built by the Church of Scaly Robots in 2963, destroyed in 2993 due to starvation.

Civ Name: Second Republic of Yellow Koboldoids 
Civ Birth Year: 3513 
Civ Stats Str|Dex|Con|Int|Cha
          0 | 0 | 1 | -1 | -5 | 
Resources 8 Science 0 Military 0 WeapLevel 0 TechLevel 1 Decrepitude 0
Slaves on Krantor IV revolt, killing their oppressors and declaring the Free Second Republic of Yellow Koboldoids.
The Church of Two-Headed Purple Robots attack Krantor IV, a colony of the Second Republic of Yellow Koboldoids, and subject it to orbital bombardment, killing 7 billion.

3592:
Pollution kills a billion Scaly Robots with Five-fold Symmetry on Bomev II.
Scaly Robots with Five-fold Symmetry have died out on Bomev II!
The Yellow Koboldoids on Regor IV devour one billion of their own kind in a mad frenzy of cannibalism!
Pollution kills a billion Yellow Koboldoids on Eykos I.
Yellow Koboldoids have died out on Eykos I!
Pollution kills a billion Yellow Koboldoids on Regor VI.
Overcrowding on Bomev II leads to increased pollution.
Overcrowding on Regor IV leads to increased pollution.
Overcrowding on Eykos I leads to increased pollution.
Overcrowding on Regor VI leads to increased pollution.
Overcrowding on Krantor IV leads to increased pollution.
Overcrowding on Femuv V leads to increased pollution.
Overcrowding on Lumen II leads to increased pollution.
Overcrowding on Jurvox III leads to increased pollution.
